metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25263 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Local privilege vulnerability in Yandex Browser for Windows prior to 21.9.0.390 allows a local, low privileged, attacker to execute arbitary code with the SYSTEM privileges through manipulating files in directory with insecure permissions during Yandex Browser update process.

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
